model
Class StateFullSchedule

java.lang.Object
  model.StateFullSchedule

public class StateFullSchedule
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the most important of the wall program. It contains all the data, it is really the model in a model-view-controler pattern This class has also everything to construct himself from a file, or save him to a file

Author:
Dubruille Xavier, Delange Jonas

constructCardStateFromLine

private void constructCardStateFromLine(java.lang.String[] line,
                                        int cardId)
Called for each lines of the file containing the courses,teachers, ect It's separeted from the rest because it can be called from any type of file (in our case: csv and xls)

Parameters:
line - the String table representing a line of the file
cardId - the card id, must be different each time the method is called.
